description: The sacred territory of Skypiea, formerly known as Jaya before being shot into the sky 400 years ago. It is ruled by Enel and serves as the battleground for his survival game.

keyEvents.title: Klabautermann Repairs Going Merry at Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry's ship spirit appears and repairs the ship overnight while it rests at Upper Yard, witnessed by Usopp.
keyEvents.significance: Upper Yard serves as the location where the crew discovers the supernatural bond with their ship.

keyEvents.title: Survival Game Declared for Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: Enel announces that Upper Yard will become the battleground for his survival game, with full access granted to all areas.
keyEvents.significance: Upper Yard transforms from a restricted sacred territory into an open battlefield.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Departs the Altar
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats successfully move the Going Merry off the sacrificial altar using sky sharks, beginning their journey through Upper Yard toward the southern shore.
keyEvents.significance: The crew regains mobility and begins executing their escape plan.

statusHistory.reason: Upper Yard remains the primary battleground for the Skypiea conflict
